description: Finish every sentence with an emote
Sing a karaoke medley
Replace every verb with Bingo
Solve a riddle
Play a round of GeoGuessr (please do it only when ahead of schedule or in setup block)
Play a Bingothon themed drinking game
Put a donation message into google translator a few times, translate it back to English and read it out loud
Talk in funny voices and pretend to be confused when chat brings it up
Talk like pirates
Describe a main character or story premise very poorly
Become a DJ at a radio station
Commentate the next run like golf commentators (ideal for GWYF bingo)
Play a round of actual bingo
Hosts are reporter reporting BREAKING NEWS about bingos
One host pretends to fall asleep during an intermission, the other tries to wake them up
Would you press the button?
Hosts play 2 truths 1 lie
Host the Bingo Awards and award the Bingo of the Year award
Advertise a crazy new fictional product
Hosts speak in movie quotes
Ask ChatGPT to write you rap and perform it
Only talk in question for the entire intermission
Read a charity blurb out backwards
Act like judges on the famous casting show Bingo's Got Talent
Pretend you are freeing Panda, but in reality you are onlu relocating him, cause the basement needs to be renovated
